    public class CompanyDAODB
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO
    AN object designed to contact a DB to perform operations for the companies

      • removeCompany

        public void removeCompany(Company company)
                   throws CouponServerException
        remove company from DB (Access) , need object of company this method don't remove all coupons and the past purchase. for this you need the methods removeCoupon(coupon) and removeCouponPurchase(long) It is recommended to do in instance of AdminastorFacade in method removeCompany(company).
        Specified by:
        removeCompany in interface CompanyDAO
        Throws:
        CouponServerException
